p: Cells were infected with virus diluted in serum-free IMDM or DMEM at 37°C (MOI as indicated in the text or relevant figure legends) and replaced with serum-free cell culture medium supplemented with 1 μg · ml −1 l-1-tosylamide-2-phenylethyl chloromethyl ketone (TPCK) trypsin (Worthington-Biochemical) after 1 to 2 h. Cell supernatants were harvested at indicated time points postinfection. Infectious titers were determined by plaque assay on MDCK cells. All virus infection assays were performed in triplicate at least twice; Fig. 3a to d and Fig. S4 show one representative triplicate assay.
